Package com.ben12.reta.api

Interface RequirementSourceManager

public interface RequirementSourceManager
Requirement manager interface for a requirement source. Used for adding requirement.
Author:
Beno√Æt Moreau (ben.12)

    Method

    Requirement
    addRequirement(String summary, String id, String version, String content, Map<String,String> attributes)
    Add and return the new Requirement.
    Use the returned Requirement for add the covered references (Requirement.addReference(String, String, String, Map)).

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns:
      requirement source name

    • addRequirement

      Requirement addRequirement(String summary, String id, String version, String content, Map<String,String> attributes)
      Add and return the new Requirement.
      Use the returned Requirement for add the covered references (Requirement.addReference(String, String, String, Map)).
      Parameters:
      summary - requirement summary
      id - requirement ID
      version - requirement version
      content - requirement content description
      attributes - requirement additional attributes
      Returns:
      requirement added, null if requirement (id, version) already exists
